fields.name: Sea Beast's Scourge (C1)
fields.value:
When Stormbreaker is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

fields.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises (C2)
fields.value: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump 2 additional targets.

fields.name: Summoner of Storm (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Stunning Revenge (C4)
fields.value: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

fields.name: Crimson Tidewalker (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Bane of Evil (C6)
fields.value: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding enemies is decreased by 15%.
